name: Introduction to Programming
description: Programming refers to a technological process for telling a computer which tasks to perform in order to solve problems.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Data Structures is about how data can be stored in different structures. Algorithms is about how to solve different problems, often by searching through and manipulating data structures.

name: Web Development
description: Web development, also known as website development, refers to the tasks associated with creating, building, and maintaining websites and web applications that run online on a browser.
